item.title: Data Preparation: Missing Records
item.description: Raw data is often messy and missing values are a common issue that data scientists have to deal with.

item.title: Data Preparation: Categorical
item.description: Introduction Qualitative feature encoding When dealing with machine learning algorithms, the format and quality of the input data are important to model performance.
